title: Training Workshop on Structural Equation Modelling (SEM) in R
text:
Schedule
Sessions
Topics





Day 1 morning session: 13 March 2023


Intro to R programming


R objects
R packages
Reading data in R
Basic data wrangling




Day 1 afternoon session: 13 March 2023


Exploratory Factor Analysis (EFA)


Objective of EFA
Designing EFA
Assumptions in EFA
Deriving factors and assessing overall fit
Interpreting factors




Day 2 morning session: 14 March 2023


Confirmatory Factor Analysis (CFA)


CFA overview
CFA with Lavaan package
Defining constructs
Developing measurement model
Assessing measurement model validity




Day 2 afternoon session: 14 March 2023


Covariance and Partial-least Square SEM


Specifying structural model
Assessing the structural model validity

title: Helpful guide
text:
Hello there! If you are new in R and RStudio, check out these helpful videos for the installation or basic navigation of R and RStudio.
We are excited to have you in our training, see you there!

2 Getting started with R
